name: Premium Arabica Coffee
description: Our Premium Arabica Coffee is sourced from the lush hills of Chikmagalur, Karnataka. Known for its smooth, sweet taste with notes of chocolate and caramel, this medium-roast coffee delivers a perfectly balanced cup every time. Each batch is carefully roasted to bring out the complex flavors that make Arabica beans so sought after.
shortDescription: Smooth, sweet coffee with notes of chocolate and caramel.

name: Premium Robusta Coffee
description: Our Robusta Coffee comes from the finest coffee estates in Chikmagalur. These premium beans offer a strong, full-bodied flavor with a distinctive earthy aroma. Perfect for those who prefer their coffee with a bold kick, our Robusta beans are carefully selected and roasted to perfection.
shortDescription: Strong, full-bodied coffee with rich earthy notes.

name: Premium Arecanut
description: Our Premium Arecanut is harvested from the finest arecanut palms in Chikmagalur. These high-quality nuts are known for their consistent quality and authentic flavor. Each nut is carefully processed using traditional methods to preserve its natural properties and distinctive taste.
shortDescription: Premium quality arecanuts with authentic flavor.

name: Black Pepper Premium
description: Our Black Pepper Premium is grown in the fertile soils of Karnataka. These peppercorns are hand-picked at optimal ripeness to ensure maximum flavor and aroma. With a perfect balance of heat and complex flavor notes, this pepper will elevate any dish with its distinctive pungency and aromatic qualities.
shortDescription: Hand-picked black pepper with intense flavor.
